title: Vampire Summon
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Vampire Summon''' is a monsters-only spell which summons creatures much like the spell [[Summon Small Mammals]]. However, it summons a greater number of mammals (3-5) and replaces the harmless [[quokka]]s with dangerous [[orange rat]]s.

The following enemies cast Vampire Summon:
*[[Vampire (monster)|Vampire]]
*[[Vampire knight]]
*[[Deep elf summoner]]

==Strategy==
This spell is mostly just annoying. By the time you encounter vampires, you're usually quite well prepared to handle even orange rats. rN+ can help if you really don't want to get drained, though usually if you're careful and prioritize the orange rats, you won't lose much XP anyway.

==History==
This spell was removed in [[0.12]].
